name: WiiU or 3DS Animation File
summary: Learn about .JMOT files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Some WiiU and 3DS video games use the .JARC archive format to store game assets. JARC archives contain in-game model, texture, and animation files. Together, these files are used to show and animate game characters, locations, and items.

JMOT files are in-game animation files, which are used to animate in-game models (.JMDL file) to "skin" it. For example, the files used to animate Dragon Ball Fusions characters are saved as JMOT files.

instructions: While player-created extraction and import utilities exist for some specific JMOT files, most JMOT files cannot be opened outside the game they are used in.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
